markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Improvisational Warrior](/Feats.aspx?ID=1223) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Shoony" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=296" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows](/Sources.aspx?ID=29) pg. 73</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Improvisational Defender](/Feats.aspx?ID=1217)

</column>

---

When you use an improvised weapon, you apply the critical specialization of a [brawling](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=4) weapon to it. Depending on the shape and nature of the improvised weapon, your GM might determine another weapon group’s critical specialization is more appropriate.
name: Improvisational Warrior
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Shoony" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=296" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows](/Sources.aspx?ID=29) pg. 73</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Improvisational Defender](/Feats.aspx?ID=1217)

</additional-info>

---

<summary>
You have increased skill with improvised weapons.
</summary>
summary: You have increased skill with improvised weapons.

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 9" pfs="Standard" > Improvisational Warrior Source Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows pg. 73 Prerequisites Improvisational Defender --- When you use an improvised weapon, you apply the critical specialization of a brawling weapon to it. Depending on the shape and nature of the improvised weapon, your GM might determine another weapon group’s critical specialization is more appropriate.
